text: phwk khea klaw wa “xo sx læa h xey! Nænxn than khey pen khwam hwang nı hmu phwk rea ma kxn badni than ca ham mi hı rea khea rph xi ba dah sing thi brrphburusʹ khxng rea khea rph xi ba dah xyu kranan hrux? Læa thæcring phwk rea xyu nı kar sngsay tx sing thi than reiyk rxng cheiy chwn rea yang sing nan”
